#summary The Submission element for XForms 1.1

= Introduction =

The submssion component should be enhanced to support the [http://www.w3.org/TR/xforms11/#submit XForms 1.1 spec].


= Stories =
  * tbd
  * implement serialization 
    * dispatch xforms-submit-serialization event
    * submission-body property  
  * xforms-submit-error with context
    * property=resource-uri
    * property=response-status-code
    * property=response-headers
    * property=response-reason-phrase
    * property=response-body
    * property=error-type
      * error-type=submission-in-progress
      * error-type=no-data
      * error-type=validation-error
      * error-type=parse-error
      * error-type=target-error
      * error-type=resource-error
  * xforms-submit-done with context
    * property=resource-uri
    * property=response-status-code
    * property=response-headers
    * property=response-reason-phrase
